Hydras:

"Good luck my sweet tigress, come to me as soon as you can"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> She felt rather odd with that question. "Perhaps. A friend... a 
comrade. She 
> does follow orders rather well. That is all I can say about her." 
brief pause, 
> "I will bring Blackstorm back as soon as we have had out 
rendezvous with the 
> crashed Decepticons." 
> 
> She hadn't really pondered the idea of her being anyone's friend. 
It was 
> usually a comrade or fellow warrior. They all had a duty to 
perform & did it. 
> 
> Internally, she picked up a weak signal that was actually not too 
far away. 
> "The group of crashed Decepticons are not that far. Once I have 
them, we shall 
> return immediately to base."  
> 
> After a moment's thought on the last couple words, she smiled & 
tried to 
> contain her excitement. "Until then?" She purred as she smiled, 
her optics gazing 
> off in the direction of the weak Decepticon signal.
